ai-patthana15.59:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.59:1.1_0: Kindness arises dependent on the Teacher, without cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.59:1.1_2: Knowledge principles with rapture, and skillful qualities arise.
ai-patthana15.59:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.59:2.1_0: Kinds of rapture, unskillful qualities don’t arise because of rapture.
ai-patthana15.59:2.1_1: Kindness arises in someone who isn’t skilled in rapture, nor skilled in means.
ai-patthana15.59:2.1_2: Kindness arises in someone who isn’t skilled in rapture and subsequently the teaching. There’s no cause or condition for cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.59:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.59:2.1_5: What is an unshakable, in the three ways?
